Package VendingModel.TransactionsClass

Class Transactions

java.lang.Object
VendingModel.TransactionsClass.Transactions
public class Transactions extends Object
This is the Transactions class. This represent the transactiions made in the vending machine. It contains the total, the payment, the change, the transaction number, the boolean to check if it was seen by maintenance as well as a boolean value if the transaction was a product or item, the item bought, and the date of the transaction.

      total - Total of the transaction
      payment - Payment of user in transaction
      change - Change produced in transaction
      item - Item bought in transaction
      number - Transaction number
      isProduct - if Transaction was by product
